name: Horace Goes Skiing... Again! - Pixel Prototype Week 3
name_original: Horace Goes Skiing... Again! - Pixel Prototype Week 3
description:
Controls:

Arrows to move

Made in one week in Bennett Foddy's Pixel Prototype Studio class at NYU.

This week's assignment: clone one game from a selection of classic 70s/80s arcade/PC games.  I chose Horace Goes Skiing.

Read more about the development here.
